mapper.update: update t_menu set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edittime = #{edittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_navigation = #{isNavigation,jdbcType=BIT}, is_publish = #{isPublish,jdbcType=BIT}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, stem = #{stem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumb = #{thumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_menu
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edittime = #{edittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_navigation = #{isNavigation,jdbcType=BIT},
is_publish = #{isPublish,jdbcType=BIT},
keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
stem = #{stem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thumb = #{thumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, alias, author, description, edittime, is_navigation, is_publish, keyword, sort, stem, style, thumb, title, url, clicks from t_menu where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, parent_id, alias, author, description, edittime, is_navigation, is_publish, keyword, sort, stem, style, thumb, title, url, clicks from t_menu
select id, parent_id, alias, author, description, edittime, is_navigation, is_publish, keyword, sort, stem, style, thumb, title, url, clicks from t_menu where parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, parent_id, alias, author, description, edittime, is_navigation, is_publish, keyword, sort, stem, style, thumb, title, url, clicks from t_menu where stem LIKE #{pattern}
select id, parent_id, alias, author, description, edittime, is_navigation, is_publish, keyword, sort, stem, style, thumb, title, url, clicks from t_menu where stem = #{stem}
